mapper.select: SELECT pub.uniquename as uniqueName, split_part(pub.uniquename, ':', 1) as database, split_part(pub.uniquename, ':', 2) as accession FROM feature_cvterm JOIN pub on feature_cvterm.pub_id = pub.pub_id WHERE feature_cvterm.feature_cvterm_id = #{feature_cvterm_id} AND uniqueName != 'null' UNION SELECT pub.uniquename as uniqueName, split_part(pub.uniquename, ':', 1) as database, split_part(pub.uniquename, ':', 2) as accession FROM feature_cvterm_pub JOIN pub on feature_cvterm_pub.pub_id = pub.pub_id WHERE feature_cvterm_pub.feature_cvterm_id = #{feature_cvterm_id} AND uniqueName != 'null'

SELECT dbxref.accession as accession, db.name as database, db.urlprefix, db.url FROM feature_cvterm JOIN feature_cvterm_dbxref ON feature_cvterm.feature_cvterm_id = feature_cvterm_dbxref.feature_cvterm_id JOIN dbxref ON feature_cvterm_dbxref.dbxref_id = dbxref.dbxref_id JOIN db ON dbxref.db_id = db.db_id WHERE feature_cvterm.feature_cvterm_id = #{feature_cvterm_id}
